医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
多域酶的发现增强了药物开发潜力新加坡国立大学 (NUS) 的药学科学家鉴定并表征了一种独特的多域酶，该酶能够催化两种不同类型的反应，这两种反应对于制造药物分子都至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Discovery-of-multidomain-enzyme-enhances-drug-development-pottial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Discovery-of-multidomain-enzyme-enhances-drug-development-potial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=555d52bd-ea3d-46f3-bb3d-e99437d0c9ef Tue, 29 Oct 2024 21:20:43 -0400 Discovery of multidomain enzyme enhances drug development potential
BRAF和MEK抑制剂成功治疗转移性恶性血管球瘤2024 年 10 月 11 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一份新病例报告，题为“BRAF V600E 突变转移性恶性球瘤中对 encorafenib 加 binimetinib 的完全缓解”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Successful-treatment-of-metastatic-malignant-glomus-tumor-with-BRAF-and-MEK-inhibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Successful-treatment-of-metastatic-malignant-glomus-tumor-with-BRAF-and-MEK-inhibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0d3f6b1-2876-4a87-9cc1-9762a4ea80bc Tue, 29 Oct 2024 21:15:58 -0400 Successful treatment of metastatic malignant glomus tumor with BRAF and MEK inhibitors
甘草查尔酮 B 对辐射引起的细胞损伤的辐射防护作用辐射损伤对人体健康构成严重威胁，对细胞和组织造成复杂、多方面的损伤。这种伤害可能由多种因素引起，包括核事故、医学放射治疗和太空旅行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Radioprotective-effects-of-Licochalcone-B-against-radiation-induced-cell-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Radioprotective-effects-of-Licochalcone-B-against-radiation-induced-cell-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71db97ec-3d55-4be6-8089-3eb9f8044b2f Tue, 29 Oct 2024 21:08:26 -0400 Radioprotective effects of Licochalcone B against radiation-induced cell damage
用于测量肝病患者活性白蛋白的比率荧光探针白蛋白是晚期肝病患者的主要预后因素，取决于其浓度和生物活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Ratiometric-florescent-probes-for-measuring-active-albumin-in-liver-disease-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Ratiometric-florescent-probes-for-measuring-active-albumin-in-liver-disease-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c9f9d12-9b7d-4f5b-9ca7-7b6cb0b0a348 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 21:03:11 -0400 Ratiometric fluorescent probes for measuring active albumin in liver disease patients
解风解毒胶囊治疗流感作用机制疏风解毒胶囊（SFJD）是一种中药制剂，广泛应用于临床治疗流感，但其作用机制尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Unraveling-the-mechanism-of-Shufeng-Jiedu-Capsules-in-influenza-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Unraveling-the-mechanism-of-Shufeng-Jiedu-Capsules-in-influenza-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3332817e-a26d-4cf4-914f-339022001dfc Tue, 29 Oct 2024 21:00:21 -0400 Unraveling the mechanism of Shufeng Jiedu Capsules in influenza treatment
研究人员开发出预测乳腺癌患者免疫治疗反应的新方法约翰霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心和约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员利用计算工具开发了一种方法来评估哪些转移性三阴性乳腺癌患者可以从免疫治疗中受益。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-predict-immunotherapy-response-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Researchers-develop-new-approach-to-predict-immunotherapy-response-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f8c6a5f-eae5-42a4-b2b6-11195df2e9ab Tue, 29 Oct 2024 15:33:41 -0400 Researchers develop new approach to predict immunotherapy response in breast cancer patients
关于 1 型强直性肌营养不良症心脏缺陷的新见解强直性肌营养不良症 1 型 (DM1) 是最常见的成人发病形式的肌营养不良症，患者的小腿、手、颈部和面部的肌肉质量和力量会逐渐丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-insights-into-cardiac-defects-in-Myotonic-Dystropy-Type-1.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-insights-into-cardiac-defects-in-Myotonic-Dystropy-Type-1.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5872c986-7441-418c-903c-c74df2f72ee8 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 15:26:20 -0400 New insights into cardiac defects in Myotonic Dystrophy Type 1
制定新建议以统一 sJIA 和 AOSD sJIA 和 AOSD 具有相同的特征，并且有相同的四个主要症状。然而，这两种情况传统上是根据诊断时的年龄来区分的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-recommendations-development-to-unify-sJIA-and-AOSD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/New-recommendations-development-to-unify-sJIA-and-AOSD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adee7790-e733-4bf1-91af-ff81eac1886a Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:58:00 -0400 New recommendations developed to unify sJIA and AOSD
家庭暴力被发现对健康产生严重的长期影响一项新的全球证据综合表明，家庭暴力与长期健康后果之间存在密切联系，对全世界数百万人的心理和身体健康产生了重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Family-violence-found-to-have-severe-long-term-health-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Family-violence-found-to-have-severe-long-term-health-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bc4761e-ddc4-46f2-8006-b2a95274878b Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:52:00 -0400 Family violence found to have severe long-term health effects
发现细胞在分裂过程中如何重组活细胞就像一座繁华的大都市，无数的分子和蛋白质在拥挤的空间中向各个方向移动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Discovering-how-cells-reorganize-during-division.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241029/Discovering-how-cells-reorganize-during-division.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbd4c346-bfee-48fa-bfbb-13306c915ab4 Tue, 29 Oct 2024 14:47:47 -0400 Discovering how cells reorganize during division
